mapper.select: select * from tbl_group_fans where group_id=#{groupId} and member_id=#{memberId}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_group_fans where group_id=#{groupId} and member_id=#{memberId}
mapper.select: select a.group_id as 'group.id',a.member_id as 'member.id',b.name as 'member.name',b.avatar as 'member.avatar' FROM tbl_group_fans as a left join tbl_member as b on a.member_id = b.id WHERE a.group_id=#{groupId} order by a.create_time DESC

select a.group_id as 'group.id',b.name as 'group.name',b.logo as 'group.logo', (select count(c.id) from tbl_group_topic as c where group_id=a.group_id and c.status=1) as 'group.topicCount', (select count(*) from tbl_group_fans as d where group_id=a.group_id) as 'group.fansCount' FROM tbl_group_fans as a INNER JOIN tbl_group as b on a.group_id = b.id WHERE a.member_id=#{memberId} order by a.create_time DESC
